snippet: Marcelo Co, a former Moreno Valley city councilman, has agreed to plead guilty to bribery and filing a false tax return after accepting a $2.3 million illegal payment, the authorities said Tuesday.
abstract: California authorities says former Moreno Valley city councilman Marcelo Co has agreed to plead guilty to bribery and filing false tax return after accepting $2.3 million illegal payment.
lead_paragraph: Marcelo Co, a former Moreno Valley city councilman, has agreed to plead guilty to bribery and filing a false tax return after accepting a $2.3 million illegal payment, the authorities said Tuesday.

headline.main: California: Ex-Councilman to Plead Guilty to Bribery
headline.print_headline: California: Ex-Councilman To Plead Guilty To Bribery
